original_title: Long Distance Calling: STUMMFILM - Live From Hamburg
overview: For 13 years the quartet Long Distance Calling, which is based in MÃ¼nster, has been praised and celebrated for its equally weightless and colossal music. After returning to their instrumental roots, Long Distance Calling planned the next step. Under the perfect tour title 'Seats and Sounds', the band performed in front of a seated audience.
title: Long Distance Calling: STUMMFILM - Live From Hamburg
